General.Name: Vinvest Capital Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Vinvest Capital Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, provides civil engineering and construction, aluminium design and fabrication, telecommunication engineering, and property development services in Malaysia. It is also involved in the fabrication and installation of aluminium doors and windows; trading of construction materials; and import, export, and mining of nature resources, as well as sale and trade of iron or other minerals. In addition, it engages in telecommunication engineering; and property development and related activities. The company was formerly known as Vivocom Intl Holdings Berhad and changed its name to Vinvest Capital Holdings Berhad in July 2021. Vinvest Capital Holdings Berhad is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
